title: Stuck On Login Screen
body:
Hope this is the right forum for this, because I'm getting desperate.

I'm trying to log into my account, but after it authenticates my password it makes a sound like it's loading in but it just keeps saying loading forever. 

I know this is something to do with my laptop (the game is fine on my comp) but I don't know what to do about it and I really need help.

I've tried:

* Uninstalling and reinstalling
* Hextech repair tool
* Running as admin 
* Removing antivirus
* Turning off firewall
* Clicking directly on "sign in"

Any other ideas?

replies.body: You've taken some solid steps to make sure the patcher has permission to load, but this actually sounds like an network problem failing to reach the authentication server.  My suggestion in this case would be to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear any blocks along the way.  Hopefully that does the trick!

Thanks for taking the time to respond. I tried the connection guide with no success. I opened up a ticket with support so hopefully they can look at my files and figure out what's going on. Thanks for your input!
